DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy UB-421 Antibody HIV-1 Infected Adults
DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic , treatmentnaive , HIV1 seropositive CD4+ T cell count > 350 cells/cubic millimeter HIV1 viral load > 5,000 copies/mL Other inclusion criterion apply Active infection require immediate therapy ( except HIV1 ) Previous exposure monoclonal antibody ( include UB421 ) Prior participation HIV vaccine trial Use immunomodulating drug systemic chemotherapy Other exclusion criterion apply
